category.name: wbb.acp.board
category.item: Default Icon
(Default Icon)
The icon will be shown in the board list next to the board if it does not contain unread threads.
The choosen icon is invalid. Please choose an icon from the selection.
Color of Default Icon
The choosen color is invalid. Please use the color picker to select a color.
Unread Icon
The icon will be shown in the board list next to the board if it contains unread threads.
The choosen icon is invalid. Please choose an icon from the selection.
Color of Unread Icon
The choosen color is invalid. Please use the color picker to select a color.
Icons
Use special color for default icon
Use special color for unread icon

category.name: wbb.acp.boardIcon
category.item: Add Board Icon
Do you really want to delete this board icon?
Select Board Icon
Edit Board Icon
Icon
Allowed file extensions: gif, jpg, jepg, png

Please note that by default, icons of size 32×32 pixels are used. If you are using a custom style, it might be necessary that the icons are bigger, hence the upload only checks the icon's minimum size.
Board Icons
The uploaded file has an invalid file extension.
The minimum height of the uploaded image has to be 32px.
The minimum width of the uploaded image has to be 32px.
The uploaded file is no image.
Uploading of file has failed due to an unknown error.

category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: Default Icon
The icon will be shown in the board list next to the board with no unread threads.
Unread Icon
The icon will be shown in the board list next to the boards with unread threads.

category.name: wcf.acp.group
